#include <stdio.h>

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int n=0, i=0, flag=0; 
	float count=0, a, f;
	scanf("%d\n", &n);
	char array[n];

	for(i=0; i<n; i++)
	{
		scanf("%c", &array[i]);
	}

	scanf("\n%f %f", &a, &f);

	for(i=0; i<n; i++)
	{
		if(array[i] == 'R')
		{
			count += a;
		}
		else if(array[i] == 'L')
		{
			count -= a;
		}
		if( (count <= (-f)) || (count >= f) )
		{
			flag = 1;
			break;
		}
	}

	if(flag == 0)
		printf("YES\n");
	else
		printf("NO\n");

	return 0;
}
